divs: Sighting DetailsIt's been appearing a few times during the past ten days. It's cigar-shaped, with something like a ball in the middle. It glows yellowish-orange, like fire, and moves fast. Sometimes it emits sparks. A few times it came very close, and seemed to be witht the size of a car. Other times it can be seen in the distance as a very big yellow star that moves, then stops, sometimes changes direction. Before it disappears, it blinks a few times, as with each blinking it becomes smaller. A source whom I can trust informed me that such objects belong to the military. I don't mention the city where it's seen on purpose. I still don't have any pics of it.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been 23 other sightings in Mexico City
There were no other sightings in Mexico City on or around March 15th 2011
Summary: A cigar shaped object glowing yellow and emitting sparks
